TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectQuery extends System.Management.ManagementQuery

Docs.summary: Represents a management query that returns instances or classes.

remarks.format: This class or its derivatives are used to specify a query in the <xref:System.Management.ManagementObjectSearcher>. Use a more specific query class whenever possible.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
